snippet: Russell Westbrook had 29 points and 10 assists for Oklahoma City, which bounced back from a 32-point loss to San Antonio in Game 1.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Cleveland Cavaliers defeat Atlanta Hawks, 104-93, in second-round Eastern Conference series opener; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Russell Westbrook had 29 points and 10 assists for Oklahoma City, which bounced back from a 32-point loss to San Antonio in Game 1.

headline.print_headline: Cavaliers Hold Off Surge by Hawks to Win Opener
headline.main: Thunder Hand Spurs a Rare Home Loss and Even Their Series
